staff.name: Scott Frank
staff.description: Scott Frank is the creator, writer, and director of The Queen's Gambit, known for his captivating storytelling and direction that brought the novel to life on screen.

staff.name: Allan Scott
staff.description: Allan Scott co-created and wrote The Queen's Gambit, contributing to the series' narrative depth and character development.

staff.name: William Horberg
staff.description: William Horberg served as an executive producer on The Queen's Gambit, overseeing the production and ensuring its high standard of quality.

staff.name: Marcus Loges
staff.description: Marcus Loges played a key role as an executive producer, contributing to the series' development and success.

staff.name: Scott Rudin
staff.description: Scott Rudin was an executive producer on The Queen's Gambit, bringing his expertise to the production.
